get.description:
Retrieve a list of study programs based on user role.
- Admins see all study programs.
- Supervisors see study programs they supervise.
- Teachers see study programs they are assigned to.
- Students see study programs they are enrolled in.

Retrieve courses.

- Otherwise, return all courses (admin/supervisor) or courses user is part of.
